news1: Maruti Suzuki’s domestic vehicle sales decreased by 0.6% YoY to 1.3 lakh units in March. The company said the shortage of electronic components impacted production. Meanwhile, Tata Motors’ domestic sales rose 3% YoY to 89,351 units. Company’s management expects demand for passenger vehicles to remain robust in future. : Adani Ports has completed the acquisition of Puducherry-based Karaikal Port after getting approval from National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT). The company paid ₹1485 crore for the deal. With this acquisition, the company has 14 operational ports in India.
